trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Anderson
There were no other sightings in Anderson on or around November 13th 2013
Summary: I was outside talking to my stepson and looked up and seen a flock thought it was birds went in to get binoculars and noticed theywere not birds but air craft over 200 of them and then all of a sudden we both seen them all disappear
divs: Sighting DetailsMy stepson was working on his vehicle out on the street in front of my home . I went out to see how he was doing as I was having computer issues which ended up for no apparent reason . Anyway I looked up and said oh they are spraying chemtrails again and I seen this what looked like a flock of Geese , so I said check out that flock of birds they look like they are flying in a strange pattern . My stepson said not only that they are awfully high for birds , so I ran into the house and grabbed my binoculars . I came out and looked at them again and noticed that they shined sort of but were a opaque like color like a Pearl essence type of color and so I pulled the binoculars down and I said those are not birds they are some strange looking air craft and we were watching them fly across the sky when suddenly they all just disappeared ! This was this mourning and I am still freaked out by it !
